The commoner who speaks directly to Ned Stark, and indicates that Gregor Clegane was responsible for the attack, is a brewer from Sherrer named Joss. sections.In the books: In the ''[[Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the handful of surviving smallfolk from the town of Sherrer are brought before the [[Iron Throne]] by a trio of knights from the Riverlands (Karyl Vance, Marq Piper, and Raymun Darry). The commoner who speaks directly to Ned Stark, and indicates that Gregor Clegane was responsible for the attack, is a brewer from Sherrer named Joss.  The TV series credits only listed him as "Riverlands refugee", but it is clear which book character he was portraying.
